To install ISO8583 Python library is a piece of cake :)

1) Download the package

2) Un-compress it

3) Go to the folder where setup.py is

4) Build the package with the command: "python setup.py sdist"

5) Install with the command: "python setup.py install"

6) That's it!

7) Enjoy, read, learn the examples in the "ExamplesPage" directory.
